values:
O_o yeah I guess you're wondering why I'm posting with this name. It's because LJ fucking fails. They suspended my other account. I don't fucking know why and right now I just don't fucking care. I'll wait until they unsuspend my account to type out about the past couple days. Right now, all I'll just say is that Kriats fucking rules and I love her. XD She really made all the crap I went through worth it. Yeah, let's just say I had the worst luck on this trip. I mean the WORST. I'll talk about it later though, maybe, hopefully.

I bet Jericho was sick of seeing me by the time he boarded his plane though, literally. LOLz.

I got a new journal cause I'm sick of this name: <lj user="__hellsbelle">

This one is friends' only though, so comment to be added.
http://myspace.com/tragicallyunhip Don't ask me why I did it. I must be really fucking bored. So like add me as a friend and stuff if you have one.

deer rajah,

u fale @ noos reprots.

kl

I just want to say that my LJ friends are some of the coolest people I have ever met in my life. When I had my personal site, I never wanted an LJ cause I thought it was really stupid to have that and another blog. I'm glad I got this though because I found so many awesome people with the same interests as me. I've been having a lot of fun the past few nights with , , and . You guys PWN, and I love ya. Then there's who is a neverending source of entertainment for me. He is probably the most hilarious person I have ever met. He's crazy, but I <3 him. also pwns. We rarely talk on AIM because we're too busy having conversations in LJ comments, lol. But her Jericho obsessing reminds me of me and for that I love her. She's awesome. XD Everyone I didn't mention, I love y'all too. XD You all fucking rock and I'm glad to have ya as my friends. :) Last night, I was bored, so I made this: http://donebleeding.org/abstract.jpg. Don't ask me what it is, but I was just playing around with some stuff and that's what I came up with. I know I SHOULD be making icons. I've tried but they all turned out like poop. :(

So I'm still pissed about Dawn getting canned. I'm still impatiently waiting for the remaining cuts. Probably one of them will be bound to piss me off. Just the fact that they're doing this is pissing me off. It's weird how pretty much all the people cut so far were on SD. It's like they're deliberately killing that roster or something.

I swear if Nova gets cut, I will slit someone's throat. >:(

And I agree with everyone else on my friend's list. GET RID OF CANDICE FOR THE LOVE OF GOD! I mean Joy was fucking released and she did more than Candice and that's not saying much.

WWE has decided not to proceed with any renegotiations with Bubba and D-Von Dudley. We wish both Bubba and D-Von the best in all future endeavors. Also, World Wrestling Entertainment has come to agreements on the release of the following Superstars. WWE would like to wish them the best in their future endeavors. * Kenzo Suzuki * Matt Morgan * Charlie Haas * Jackie Gayda * Marty Jannetty * Dawn Marie * Mark Jindrak * Maven * Shannon Moore * James Yun (Akio) * David Heath (Gangrel) * Billy Kidman * Spike Dudley * Kevin Fertig OMFG....DIE WWE DIE. This is the biggest bunch of bullshit I have ever seen in my fucking life. Yeah let's release all these people so we can free up some money to hire all those bitches in the fucking Diva Search and so we can rehire Brock (who fucking shit on the fucking company after he left). Yeah makes a lot of fucking sense, dipshits. Yeah and let's hire Skull Von Krush, who fucking sucks and always has fucking sucked. Good move idiots. I am so pissed off right now. I hope Dawn sues their asses considering she was fired during a maternity leave, and I think that's against the law or something. I would really like to know what their fucking thinking right now. I mean firing the Dudleys?? WTF. They're like the only GOOD tag team they fucking have. I think I'm going to shut up now...

JERICHO IN A WIFEBEATER = OMGWTF??!?!?!?! I think I died. Wifebeaters are hot. Hot guys in wifebeaters are even hotter. I think that should be his wrestling gear from now on. As a wise woman once said (): *SPAZZFUCKDIE*

Justin says:
trying to find a record needle is like trying to find lita's hymen

Justin says:
they were all gone a long time ago

Katie says:

Katie says:
that was pwnage, total fucking pwnage. I don't think anyone could say anything to beat that ever.

Happy Independence Day and all that good shit. Me...I could care less about it. I'm not patriotic, so it's just another day to me. I gotta work, so I won't be doing anything, not that I would have anyway. I'm finally getting some peace and quiet right now with my music blasting. It's so nice. I cherish these moments, cause I don't get many of them. I thought I wasn't going to get them at first, because Stef was here all day (figures when my sis and her husband go down the shore someone's gotta come over). She didn't leave til like 10, and as soon as she was walking out, my sis and her husband came in. So by then, I just wanted to pull my fucking hair out. Then Stef comes back in, because apparently her car was broken into. So, I had to go to the gas station with her so we could vacuum all the broken glass out of the car. That was fun. Then I came home and thankfully, my sis and dickface went to bed, so I'm here all alone and I loves it! I'm talking to Chris. I haven't talked to him in forever! He's usually only on during the day now and that's when I sleep so we rarely have a conversation that lasts more than 5 minutes anymore. It sucks, 'cause I miss him. So I'm glad to finally have talked to him for a couple hours. I know he reads this sometimes, so TELL YOUR FRIEND I SAID HE'S FUCKING SMOKING!!! kthx. Now, I'm off to do stuff. Actually, no, I'm not going to do anything. But I am talking to so I'm sure he will keep me entertained for awhile since he's hilarious. Toodles.

- WWE Champion John Cena is scheduled to perform a live concert in Philadelphia, PA on 7/19. The event will emanate from the Theatre of Living Arts, with tickets on sale from yesterday. DAMNIT. Why can't we get Fozzy? >_< ROAR. I think I'm gonna go and beat him up for not being Jericho.

So I'm pissed off. As usual, right?

I'm just aggravated. I want my sis and her husband to move out so bad. I get no friggin' alone time anymore. Now that both my sister and her husband are out of the house, Stef is here to take my sister's place by sleeping on the couch and snoring like a bitch. Thx Stef. I just want to be alone for awhile. When my sis is here, she's always nagging me about something. When Stef is here (as much as I love her), she never shuts up. Plus, I always gotta watch TV with them around and I fucking hate the TV. EVERYONE JUST GO AWAY, kthx.

I have a headache and Adobe is being a bitch. Figures.

Of course, nothing much is going on. I made a new userinfo thingy though and I like it. XD I did something different than I normally do, so go me.

I've been making icons too, so hopefully I can finally update my icon journal. But Stef shall be here shortly, so I shall have to take a break from it, which I'd rather not. Balls.

I was tagged by <lj user="bartendersgirl"> so I may as well do this.

Name ten celebrities that you find attractive then tag five of your friends.

1. Chris Jericho
2. Sebastian Bach
3. RVD
4. Christian
5. Nova
6. Jon Bon Jovi
7. Bret Michaels
--------- and that's all I can think of for the moment. I am sad.

I tag..........anyone bored enough to do this shit.
Nova got traded. FUCK FUCK FUCK FUCKITY FUCK!
- Danny Doring, a former ECW World Team Team champion, will shortly be heading down to Ohio Valley Wrestling. OMGLYKEWTF? I <3333333 DANNY. Please don't turn him into another Nova, kthx.

However, the highest rated segment of the night will likely come as a surprise to a number of readers. With a 4.7 quarter, the debut of the RAW Diva Search tied the main-event for the night's top mark. WWE will definitely see this as a blessing to continue pushing the "reality" competition. Ugh...just, UGH! Anybeans, I just got home from the theater, 'cause my mom thinks since I went and saw Sweeney Todd that I want to do this more often. Umm..no. We saw West Side Story, and goddamn did I wish I had a gun the whole time. First of all, Philly theaters suck so there was no leg room. Secondly, when it first started and I saw all this cheesy dancing, I knew right then and there it was going to be a long night. Needless to say, I did not have a good time. Never again...never again. I got the ECW One Night Stand DVD that I PLANNED on watching tonight, but I just got home. I want to watch it so bad to see if Dreamer's moment at the end is on it, but man I'm fucking tired. I won't have time to watch it tomorrow either. Balls. Maybe if I get bored enough I'll hook up my DVD player and watch it. Now, I'm off...to do something. What that something is I do not know.

WWE a cool survey!!!

Created by teenwipeout and taken 12 times on bzoink!

About you
Name?Katie
Age?21

Favorites
Entrance music?Jericho's I guess.
Tattoos?O_o don't know...
Finishing move?Widow's Peak
Raw or Smackdown?RAW
Champion?Don't have one.

Legend?I think Paul Heyman's a legend, so I'll go with him.
Announcer?Heyman was awesome. Can't believe they got rid of him for Lawler.

>_< FUCK YOU CARLITO. lmao. EDIT // Diva Search getting booed = Fantastic. LMFAO @ Jericho: "Nash would pull a hamstring just picking up the phone." HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA. It's hilarious 'cause it's true. // EDIT

I have a question. I've been seeing this a lot lately. It's about the Godforsaken Diva Search. 

What is everyone's obsession with the Ashley chick? I mean you can't honestly want her to win yet since you haven't seen her do anything. She could turn out to be the most annoying chick in the damn thing. Is it because she wears fishnets? WTF.

Personally, I can't believe they're doing this again. I can't believe I'm gonna have to go to RAW and witness this shit live. Knowing how brutal Philly fans are, I hope they tear everyone a new asshole. 

How about we just skip the whole thing altogether considering most of those chicks will be hired anyway? Waste of time.

Figured I'd post 'cause I'm bored as fuck. If I wasn't talking to Krista (<3) right now, I'd probably go insane.

Since I haven't been in school, I don't do much of anything. I used to walk all the time while in school, so I haven't done it. Tonight though I decided to get off my ass and go for a walk, and ended up walking about 2 miles or so. It was nice. Fucking hot as hell, but nice. Popped in my Frameshift CD, which now has got me hooked BACK onto it. I'm gonna try to do this every day.

Krista sent me some HOT pics of Nova/Simon Dean (although I refuse to call him that, so that shall be the last time I will). I miss him. He's my buddy even if he did call me a weirdo and said I had no life for being at an ECW show on a Saturday night. Assface. He's lucky he's awesome, hot and his favorite band is Skid Row, or I'd beat his ass if I ever saw him again, haha. I remember always dragging him into chatrooms back in the day. Man, those were the days.

Hrm. I should start making icons again. I tried the other night but they all turned out like shit so I gave up. I fail at icon making and life. Sorry.

I always tell Stef that I'm not a bar person. Yet, she insists on asking me to go to them all the time. So, today she called and asked me to go for Linsey's birthday which put me on the spot 'cause it's for her birthday. So finally I relented and said I'd go. She better buy me drinks or whatever 'cause I seriously don't have the money. God I really don't feel like going just 'cause I hate those places. ://///////

Hopefully we're not out too late, which won't happen, so I most likely won't get home til like 3 or 4. So I get to spend tonight with a bunch of drunk people, yay. I'm so looking forward to it. :/

I really need to start on those icon requests I got, and I was going to tonight but then Stef, Jamie and Linsey came over. Thankfully, Jamie or Linsey didn't really bring up RAW so I didn't have to tell them about the tickets.

Anyways, all we did was watch the ECW PPV 'cause they all wanted to watch it since they haven't seen it. Then after that was over we watched an ECW tape. We watched the Born to be Wired match between Sabu and Funk. God, that match always gets me squeamish. It was the first time for Linsey seeing it and she was sitting there the whole time with her hand over her mouth saying "Oh my God." It was hilarious.

I want to e-mail RVD but his address isn't on his site anymore. I think I remember it from back in the day, so hopefully it's still his address. I just want to tell him that he is a God and I love him (and ask him if I could grab that scrumptious ass of his).

I want to make a shirt for RAW, but I don't know what I want it to say. Of course, it would have to do with Jericho (if he doesn't get traded...like that'll happen). Any ideas?

Since I'm not doing anything of importance, I figured I'd post. I saw Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street tonight with my mom. It was good. A little long, but good. Some of it made no sense to me though. Plus, it's a musical so it was really hard to follow along with the lyrics. Thankfully, I know the story already so I got the gist of it. I'm still curious as to whether he was a real guy or just a myth. My books and crimelibrary.com give the background of it but they still say they don't know if he actually existed. How can you not know if a serial killer existed? Seriously. Especially one like that...but whatever. Last night I was in an MSN chat with and ...fun times. Hopefully we can do that again sometime 'cause it was funny. XD I've been trying to work on some icons and it isn't working out too well so I think I shall save all the requests I got for tomorrow. I would like to work on some band icons rather than wrestling, but wrestling's all I got so I shall have to do those. And that is all from me. So I shall leave you with this: That's hotness right there. JERICHOPLEASEDONTGOTOSMACKDOWN! Kthx! (>_< FUCK YOU KRIATS for getting me to start saying that!!11111111)
So, I'm sitting here bored as all hell. I have nothing to do, no one to talk to. :( So I want to make icons, but I don't know of who. Any suggestions?

<lj-cut text="raw spoiler :'(">Carlito's on RAW.

Which means Jericho will probably be going to SD since you can't have the Cabana and Highlight Reel on the same show. :'( This sucks.</lj-cut>

EDIT:: GODDAMN JERICHO IS SO FUCKING SEXY. God, I love when he's a heel, it makes him all the more gorgeous. XD

Nothing much going on per usual. I finally put DB on hiatus. I think I'm just going to turn that into a portfolio since there's really no other use for it. Don't need to blog there since I have this, which I like much better. The only problem is getting the portfolio up, which I'm lazy so that may take awhile. I must thank for plugging the Cafe in his column. It already got a few more cool members 'cause of him, so thanks! Hopefully we get a few more 'cause of it. XD I want a new screen name. In fact, I want RVD Girl. I know I could use it but I need to get rid of AOL, and with losing AOL I shall lose that name, and I don't want to. :( I also want a new journal name...but that would be a pain in the ass, and I'm not sure I'd want to go through with it. I'd need a name to begin with anyway, which I don't have one in mind at the moment. So this week, I'm going to be seeing Sweeney Todd with my mom. She told me she saw that and I was like =O!! I told her I wanted to see that so bad and she was surprised I even heard about it. I'm like "Mom...I read about serial killers all the time...come on!" So Wednesday, I'm going to be seeing that, which means I'll have Wednesday, Thursday and Friday off. YAY! XD But that also means I'll be working late on Tuesday to make up the hours I'll be missing. Not looking forward to it, because I hate working with Joanie since she's such a bitch, but it's only for one night, so I think I'll last. Hopefully I can go the night without punching her. We shall see.

God, I got absolutely no friggin' sleep. It's my fault though. I went to bed at like 5. I didn't fall asleep til around 7 and got up at 9 to order tickets. Of course, my sis didn't leave me her credit card to buy the tickets like she said she would. So I fell back asleep around 10:30, then she came home at 11:30. I just spent a half hour on Ticketmaster trying to get tickets, which I finally did. Ticketmaster is so aggravating. But yeah I did get tickets, so I am going. XD

I feel really bad though. I didn't get Jamie or Linsey a ticket. I know I shouldn't feel bad because I DID try to get in touch with them for the past few days, but they never got back to me. Plus, they knew about this for a month and I told them that if they want tickets, I need the money BEFORE the 18th and that I WILL be ordering them on the 18th. I know I'm probably gonna get a lot of shit. I really don't care, 'cause I'm tired of waiting for them to decide what they want to do and them waiting til the last minute to tell me they want to do something. I'm sorry, but this is wrestling and I always want good seats, so I always order the day the tickets go on sale. I don't know if I'll be going to the Wildwood show now, which I REALLY want to do. Maybe I can convince Stef to go. 

But yeah, I guess I'm excited. Still worrying about Jericho or Christian getting drafted. That would suck majorly for me. I think we're going to go at 11 in the morning again to see if we can meet anyone coming in. Plus, I would love to see Stef chase after Edge's car again. That was hilarious. But this time we shall bring sun block so we don't get roasted.
Reply to this post, and I'll tell you one reason why I like/love/adore you. Then put this in your own journal.

My head is aching and it won't stop. Blargh. Anyways, I'm watching ECW's Matter of Respect '98. I found it in my room the other day, which means I haven't watched it in ages. It's a good show. I'd recommend it. XD I'm thinking of adding a Reviews section to my forum, so people can give reviews of shows if they'd like. Maybe I will... Tickets for RAW go on sale Saturday. I don't know what the hell is going on. I haven't heard from Jamie or Linsey in ages so I don't know if they still want to go. Stef said she'd go, so I guess I'll just be getting tickets for us two. *shrugs* ECW Hardcore Cafe. Join it! XD We could use more members to get some discussions going.

I came up with an idea to do this a long time ago, I just never got around to doing it. But after all the ECW hype, I decided right now would be a good time to do so. This is a place for old and new fans alike so if you could, please join. Named after an AOL chat I used to go into all the friggin' time back in the day and where I met my good friend , I bring to you: The ECW Hardcore Cafe.

I'm getting hives!! I'm getting hives! I'm allergic to Jason!!!" ~ Joey Styles Ahh, I missed hearing him say that all the time, lol. So, Stef will be here any minute 'cause she wants to see the PPV. So I shall be watching it for the 8th time! Yes, I am going for a record. I'm using all of WWE's bandwidth and I don't care! XD I seriously don't think I can watch WWE anymore after that PPV. RAW completely sucked ass last night. The only good thing about it was Jericho's turn. Other than that, I found myself looking for other things to do. It's just...that bad. :/ Anyways, all my ECW friends, look out for something I will be opening tonight. I already got most of it done, so I'm pretty sure I'll be finished tonight and will be able to post it. You just gotta promise me you will join it when it is finished. XD

So I'm home from work early cause I'm sick. Fucking cramps. I don't know if it's from my cramps or the stomach virus I had, but man I feel like I'm going to hurl all over the place. Plus, work was incredibly hot so that didn't help.

Cramps + Stomach Virus + Heat = Me about to die.

I'm watching the ECW PPV for the 4th fucking time! Joey just came out and everytime I see him cry, I start crying. This time it was no different. So yes...I have tears in my eyes right now, thank you very much. Joey owns every commentator and you know it.

Goddamn, I really fucking miss ECW. :'( Those were the best shows I've ever been to ever, and nothing has ever topped them since. 

I know WWE would somehow fuck it up really bad, but a part of me would love for them to bring it back.

But I must apologize, 'cause WWE did not fuck up this PPV like I thought they would. They did a great job at showing what ECW really was so props to them.

But I heard that they edited RVD's promo to cut out the parts about the creative team for the replays. That is BULLSHIT. Just 'cause they can't handle the fucking truth.

Well, the PPV has just ended. Lots of tears for me tonight. I mean LOTS. I fucking cried at so much shit. First tears: As soon as Joey came out and he was crying, which caused me to cry. It was so great seeing him again. He did a wonderful job with the PPV. So did Foley, which I was surprised. I thoroughly enjoyed their play by play. Second: During Lance's match because I realized it would be the last time I'd see him and I love him so much. I totally marked out for the Impact Player pose though! Third: RVD's promo. I could tell he was getting really choked up and I started bawling. Although after the promo was over, even though everything he said was the truth, I was like "He is so fired." Fourth: Heyman's speech got me good. Plus, he was crying too. I hate when guys cry, 'cause then I start crying, lol. Heyman is officially my God though. He freakin' owned. I'm sure there were other times but I can't think of them right now. At first I thought the PPV sucked. The matches were way short compared to ECW standards. I know why they were. But couldn't they cut about 20 minutes from JBL's pointless speech to give to the matches? Not only that, but they friggin' CUT during Doring's promo to go back to the SD! guys, which angered me GREATLY, 'cause I'm a huge Doring mark. I was looking forward to seeing him. >_< But, I tried to block the invasion out of my mind. Tried to ignore it as much as possible, and found myself REALLY enjoying the show. The Lance/Jericho match was good for the short amount of time it was given. I actually marked out when Credible and Jason came out (never thought I'd say that, but I did!). I also loved when Joey said, "Calgary - dramatic pause - Alberta, Canada." HAHA! <333 Joey. Guido/Super Crazy/ Tajiri I loved! The Moonsault off the balcony was craziness! TOTALLY FUCKING MARKED OUT for Mikey's Whippersnapper off the top rope. It looked sick. I LOVE MIKEY!!!!!! It was a really cool match. Glad they added this. Rey vs. Psicosis was cool, again for the amount of time it was given, which was like...5 minutes. I loved when the crowd booed the 619 though. =x RVD's promo was amazing. That's the RVD I know and was obsessed with back in the day. I really did cry during this promo. Not just because everything he said was the absolute truth, but because of the fact that not only was he on the verge of tears, but when he said that he would have given everything up just to have wrestled there tonight just makes me tear up thinking about it. I love that man. I truly, truly do. Sabu vs. Rhino was good for reminiscing's sake. Vintage Sabu there. Eddie Guerrero vs. Benoit was good, but who didn't think it would be? The "Edge Fucked Lita" and "He's Got Herpes" chants during it fucking owned as well. Masato vs. Awesome was fucking AWESOME! I heard both were in bad shape so the match was expected to suck, but I completely got into it. Even the crowd chanted "This match rules!" How many Awesome Bombs did Masato take?? JESUS. I fucking loved it. Heyman's promo = simply amazing. Again I cried because he was crying although the line, "I'm not crying. The reason my eyes are red is because I was smoking a joint in the back with Van Dam," was greatness. His shooting on the WWE wrestlers was fantastic. I especially loved the HHH line. That had me rolling and proved to me that Heyman is, indeed, God. Dreamer/Sandman vs. The Dudleys was great to see again too. FRANCINE!!!!!!!!!! I marked out when I saw her!!!!!! XD Beulah too! bWo...just everything basically. Although I missed the ending because the webcast froze. >_< I missed the fucking flaming table. GODDAMNIT. The invasion part was alright. Bischoff getting his ass beat was cool. All in all a GREAT PPV just for the memories it brought back for me. After hearing Styles and his awesome commentary, it's going to be hard to watch RAW and SD. Easily the best PPV in a long fucking time. Although, another thing that irked me was the themes. :( The music was a big part of ECW and the only wrestlers that used their original themes were Sandman (obviously), Sabu and Taz. I wanted to hear Lance's theme one last time. Anyways, I'm still in mark out mode so if you'll excuse me, I shall be heading off to watch some ECW tapes. E-C-DUB!

LMAO @ the "Shut the Fuck Up!" chants to Coach. Oh, how I missed those. XD Dude, it would make my night if I could hear one last promo from Storm saying: "::talks about how great he is::...'cause I'm from Calgary...Alberta...CANADA!" That would rule. If they're using all ECW themes, is Jericho going to come out to his White Zombie theme as opposed to the theme he uses now? O_o That would rock also. EDIT // YOU SUCK DICK CHANTS!!!! YES!!! // EDIT

"Tonight's ECW PPV is going to be more then the usual collection of matches, as there will be numerous angles, suprises, and possibly old video clips and different style matches. The lack of plugs for matches is no coincidence, and it doesn't really matter who wins or loses tonight. WWE didn't want matches for the PPV announced as many of the guys involved in matches tonight were teaming together for the invasion angles on RAW and SmackDown! this past week. With the invasion angle likely to play a prominent part on the show, it will be difficult to expect more than a few high calibre matches." DIE WWE DIE.

So tickets for RAW go on sale Saturday. Jamie wants to camp out for tickets, but I don't know if she can get off work Saturday. Still gotta get tickets for Wildwood too. God, why must I be so poor? :/

But now, I am not going anywhere. I hate being sick. And I have to go out and get my bitch of a pig lettuce, before she bites my other boob. Yes, she bit my boob the other day and it still hurts. She's so cute, yet incredibly evil.
